summary.span: 命名空間包含允許建立和使用隔離存放區的型別。

span.span: The namespace contains types that allow the creation and use of isolated stores.

summary.span: 使用這些存放區，您可以讀取及寫入較不受信任的程式碼無法存取的資料，並且防止儲存在檔案系統上其他地方之機密資訊的曝光。

span.span: With these stores, you can read and write data that less trusted code cannot access and prevent the exposure of sensitive information that can be saved elsewhere on the file system.

summary.span: 資料儲存在由目前使用者及程式碼存在的組件所隔離的分區中。

span.span: Data is stored in compartments that are isolated by the current user and by the assembly in which the code exists.

summary.span: 此外，網域可以隔離資料。

span.span: Additionally, data can be isolated by domain.

summary.span: 漫遊設定檔可以用來配合隔離儲存區 (Isolated Storage)，隔離存放區將隨者使用者的設定檔一起移動。

span.span: Roaming profiles can be used in conjunction with isolated storage so isolated stores will travel with the user's profile.

summary.span: 列舉型別指示不同的隔離型別。

span.span: The enumeration indicates different types of isolation.

summary.span: 如需何時使用隔離儲存區 (Isolated Storage) 的詳細資訊，請參閱隔離儲存區。

span.span: For more information about when to use isolated storage, see Isolated Storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供大部分的隔離儲存區的必要功能。The class provides most of the necessary functionality for isolated storage. 您可以使用這個類別來取得、 刪除和管理隔離儲存區。Use this class to obtain, delete and manage isolated storage. 類別處理讀取和寫入檔案存放區。The class handles reading and writing files to a store. 這是類似於讀取及寫入一般檔案 I/O 類別。This is similar to reading and writing in standard File I/O classes. 如需有關 I/O 的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間。For more information about I/O, see the namespace. 使用隔離儲存區的範例，請參閱[隔離儲存區](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md)For examples using isolated storage, see [Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md)
